meanings.definition: A young person, typically characterized by wearing designer clothing and engaging in anti-social behavior.
meanings.sent1: The chav walked down the street with loud music blaring from their phone.
meanings.sent2: Sheila's cousin is a chav who always causes trouble at the park.
meanings.sent3: The chav tried to impress everyone with their flashy new sneakers.
meanings.sent4: The party was full of chavs, each trying to outdo the other with their outfits.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the chav hanging out near the corner store, they might start trouble.

meanings.definition: To behave in a manner associated with chavs.
meanings.sent1: He decided to chav it up by wearing a tracksuit and baseball cap.
meanings.sent2: Don't chav out at the party, people might get the wrong impression.
meanings.sent3: She thought it would be funny to chav around the house in oversized sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: When he gets drunk, he tends to chav out and start acting rowdy.
meanings.sent5: The kids love to chav it up by playing loud music and hanging out on the street corner.

meanings.sent1: The group's chav style was evident in their choice of clothing.
meanings.sent2: Her room was decorated in a chav theme with neon colors and graffiti art.
meanings.sent3: The party had a chav vibe with its blaring music and flashy lights.
meanings.sent4: The car had a chav makeover with its bright paint and oversized rims.
meanings.sent5: His chav haircut drew attention wherever he went.
